memberdef.argsstring: (const simulation_setup::SystemOfBodies &bodies, const std::shared_ptr< numerical_integrators::IntegratorSettings< TimeType > > integratorSettings, const std::shared_ptr< PropagatorSettings< StateScalarType > > propagatorSettings, const std::shared_ptr< estimatable_parameters::EstimatableParameterSet< StateScalarType > > parametersToEstimate, const std::vector< double > arcStartTimes, const bool integrateDynamicalAndVariationalEquationsConcurrently=true, const bool clearNumericalSolution=true, const bool integrateEquationsOnCreation=false)
memberdef.name: HybridArcVariationalEquationsSolver

briefdescription.para: Constructor.

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor, sets up object for automatic evaluation and numerical integration of variational equations and equations of motion.
bodies
Map of bodies (with names) of all bodies in integration.
integratorSettings
Settings for numerical integrator.
propagatorSettings
Settings for propagator.
parametersToEstimate
Object containing all parameters that are to be estimated and their current settings and values.
arcStartTimes
Start times for separate arcs
integrateDynamicalAndVariationalEquationsConcurrently
Boolean defining whether variational and dynamical equations are to be propagated concurrently (if true) or sequentially (of false)
clearNumericalSolution
Boolean to determine whether to clear the raw numerical solution member variables (default true) after propagation and resetting of state transition interface.
integrateEquationsOnCreation
Boolean to denote whether equations should be integrated immediately at the end of this contructor.

memberdef.argsstring: (const simulation_setup::SystemOfBodies &bodies, const std::shared_ptr< numerical_integrators::IntegratorSettings< TimeType > > singleArcIntegratorSettings, const std::shared_ptr< numerical_integrators::IntegratorSettings< TimeType > > multiArcIntegratorSettings, const std::shared_ptr< PropagatorSettings< StateScalarType > > propagatorSettings, const std::shared_ptr< estimatable_parameters::EstimatableParameterSet< StateScalarType > > parametersToEstimate, const std::vector< double > arcStartTimes, const bool integrateDynamicalAndVariationalEquationsConcurrently=true, const bool clearNumericalSolution=true, const bool integrateEquationsOnCreation=false)
memberdef.name: HybridArcVariationalEquationsSolver

memberdef.argsstring: (const simulation_setup::SystemOfBodies &bodies, const std::shared_ptr< PropagatorSettings< StateScalarType > > propagatorSettings, const bool integrateDynamicalAndVariationalEquationsConcurrently, const bool integrateEquationsOnCreation)
memberdef.name: initializeHybridArcVariationalEquationsSolver

briefdescription.para: Destructor.
Function to integrate variational equations and equations of motion.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to integrate variational equations and equations of motion. At the end of this function, the stateTransitionInterface_ is reset with the new state transition and sensitivity matrices. If dynamical solution is to be processed, the environment is also updated to the new solution.
initialStateEstimate
Initial statez of the equations of motion that is to be used (in same order as in parametersToEstimate_). The initial states of single and multi-arcs propagations are concatenated into a single vector.
integrateEquationsConcurrently
Variable determining whether the equations of motion are to be propagated concurrently with variational equations of motion (if true), or before variational equations (if false).

briefdescription.para: Function to integrate equations of motion only.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to integrate equations of motion only. If dynamical solution is to be processed, the environment is also updated to the new solution.
initialStateEstimate
Initial state of the equations of motion that is to be used (in same order as in parametersToEstimate_). The initial states of single and multi-arcs propagations are concatenated into a single vector.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Eigen::Matrix< StateScalarType, Eigen::Dynamic, 1 > newParameterEstimate, const bool areVariationalEquationsToBeIntegrated=true)
memberdef.name: resetParameterEstimate

briefdescription.para: Function to reset parameter estimate and re-integrate equations of motion and, if desired, variational equations.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to reset parameter estimate and re-integrate equations of motion and, if desired, variational equations using the new physical parameters/body initial states.
newParameterEstimate
New estimate of parameters that are to be estimated, in same order as defined in parametersToEstimate_ member.
areVariationalEquationsToBeIntegrated
Boolean defining whether the variational equations are to be reintegrated with the new parameter values.

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve propagator settings used for equations of motion.

detaileddescription.para:

briefdescription.para: Update original propagator settings.

detaileddescription.para: Class to manage and execute the numerical integration of variational equations of a dynamical system in a combination of single and multiple arcs

Class to manage and execute the numerical integration of variational equations of a dynamical system, in addition to the dynamics itself, in a combination of single and multiple arcs. In this class, the governing equations are set once, but can be re-integrated for different initial conditions using the same instance of the class.
